quote: I know you're tired but come, this is the way.
author: Rumi

quote: I’ve got a way with love. Away with love.
author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.

quote: If you think you can then you can.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: You matter.
author: Suzanne Young,  The Treatment

quote: Some people have a way with words, and other people...oh, uh, not have way.
author: Steve Martin

quote: You have your way. I have my way. As for the right way, the correct way, and the only way, it does not exist.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Step out of my sunlight.
author: Diogenes Laërtius

quote: Anything is Possible!
author: Sealove

quote: Are you happy?
author: Ray Bradbury,  Fahrenheit 451

quote: From now on I’ll connect the dots my own way.
author: Bill Watterson

quote: You can't know, you can only believe - or not.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The Way is not in the sky; the Way is in the heart.
author: Gautama Buddha

quote: I think you ought to know I'm feeling very depressed.
author: Douglas Adams,  The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

quote: By the pricking of my thumbs, Something wicked this way comes.
author: William Shakespeare,  Macbeth

quote: Every negative...Jas a positive side...
author: Nelson M. Lubao

quote: I'd rather die my way than live yours.
author: Lauren Oliver,  Delirium

quote: May the odds be ever in your favor!
author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney Company

quote: For you, a thousand times over
author: Khaled Hosseini,  The Kite Runner

quote: Kind people have a way of working their way inside me and rooting there.
author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games

quote: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Babe!
author: Janet Evanovich

quote: I don't want to believe. I want to know.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: I think, therefore I'll think.
author: Ayn Rand,  Atlas Shrugged: 35th Anniversary Edition

quote: If you believe you can, you might. If you know you can, you will.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: When you choose one way out of many, all the ways you don't take are snuffed out like candles, as if they'd never existed.
author: Philip Pullman,  The Amber Spyglass

quote: Every negative...Has a positive side...
author: Nelson M. Lubao

quote: Even now, I wonder how much of my life is convinced.
author: Markus Zusak,  The Book Thief

quote: Whether you think you can, or you think you can't--you're right.
author: Henry Ford

quote: The only way that we can live, is if we grow. The only way that we can grow is if we change. The only way that we can change is if we learn. The only way we can learn is if we are exposed. And the only way that we can become exposed is if we throw ourselves out into the open. Do it. Throw yourself.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: The only way to support a revolution is to make your own.
author: Abbie Hoffman

quote: If not for the success that medicine has made, I might be part of a much different story right now.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar
تركي الدخيل,  كيف تربح المال بأقل مجهود!

quote: If the road is easy, you're likely going the wrong way.
author: Terry Goodkind

quote: Things work out the way they're meant to
author: Danielle Steel,  No Greater Love

quote: Is there no way out of the mind?
author: Sylvia Plath

quote: Just when I think I have learned the way to live, life changes.
author: Hugh Prather

quote: I am hope.
author: Neil Gaiman,  The Sandman, Vol. 1: Preludes and Nocturnes

quote: Anything is possible. Anything can be.
author: Shel Silverstein

quote: I'd far rather be happy than right any day.
author: Douglas Adams,  The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

quote: If not you, who?
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: My opinions may have changed, but not the fact that I'm right.
author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quote: Life's as kind as you let it be.
author: Charles Bukowski,  Hot Water Music

quote: I've got death inside me. It's just a question of whether or not I can outlive it.
author: Don DeLillo,  White Noise

quote: There is no try. There is only do.
author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars

quote: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: We can't help it. Life looks for life.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: I'm taking all the negatives in my life, and turning them into a positive.
author: Pitbull

quote: You shall love your crooked neighbour, with your crooked heart.
author: W.H. Auden
